nodes.text: Murray was a male Imperial Royal Guard who was granted paternity leave while serving aboard a vessel. When a pair of stormtroopers, Super Ace and Killer, entered the Emperor's throne room, Killer cited Murray's paternity leave as to why the room's Royal Guards were absent.
Murray was mentioned in a 2012 promotional clip on StarWars.com of Star Wars Detours, an indefinitely postponed animated series created by George Lucas.
